item.title: [Resolved] All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 maintenance
item.description:
Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (10:30 UTC — Jan 2)

Resolved - Jetstream2 maintenance completed. Dendra system service have been restarted and validation underway. (00:33 UTC — Jan 3)
item.content:

item.title: [Resolved] All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 repair
item.description:
Pending - Dendra shut down due to hosting provider storage system issues. Jetstream2 has been experiencing several ongoing system issues after the weekend power outage. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform repair. (21:30 UTC — Apr 16)

Resolved - Jetstream2 patch applied. Dendra system services have been restarted and validation underway. (00:34 UTC — Apr 17)
item.content:
Pending - Dendra shut down due to hosting provider storage system issues. Jetstream2 has been experiencing several ongoing system issues after the weekend power outage. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform repair. (21:30 UTC — Apr 16)

Resolved - Jetstream2 patch applied. Dendra system services have been restarted and validation underway. (00:34 UTC — Apr 17)

item.title: [Resolved] All systems taken offline for Jetstream2 maintenance
item.description:
Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (09:30 UTC — Apr 14)

Resolved - Jetstream2 maintenance completed. Power outage was longer than expected. Data center was switched to diesel power due to continued Duke Energy outage. Private networking issues are still being investigated by Jetstream2 team. Dendra system service have been restarted and validation underway. (05:52 UTC — Apr 15)
item.content:
Pending - Dendra shut down gracefully. Waiting for Indiana University Jetstream2 to perform maintenance and come back online so Dendra system services can be started. (09:30 UTC — Apr 14)

Resolved - Jetstream2 maintenance completed. Power outage was longer than expected. Data center was switched to diesel power due to continued Duke Energy outage. Private networking issues are still being investigated by Jetstream2 team. Dendra system service have been restarted and validation underway. (05:52 UTC — Apr 15)

item.title: [Resolved] System unavailable (Jetstream2 power outage)
item.description:
Investigating - System monitoring reported API is offline. (13:04 UTC — Aug 8)

Identified - Jetstream2 is offline due to a power outage “related to power maintenance in the IU Bloomington data center.” https://jetstream.status.io/pages/incident/61dc808a7e9a82053ce739d2/64d2431d9fabff05350acbe0 (13:29 UTC — Aug 8)

Resolved - Jetstream2 back online after power outage. API and all services are back up. (17:22 UTC — Aug 8)
item.content:
Investigating - System monitoring reported API is offline. (13:04 UTC — Aug 8)

Identified - Jetstream2 is offline due to a power outage “related to power maintenance in the IU Bloomington data center.” https://jetstream.status.io/pages/incident/61dc808a7e9a82053ce739d2/64d2431d9fabff05350acbe0 (13:29 UTC — Aug 8)

Resolved - Jetstream2 back online after power outage. API and all services are back up. (17:22 UTC — Aug 8)

item.title: [Resolved] System unavailable (Jetstream2 power outage)
item.description:
Investigating - System monitoring reported API is offline. (19:59 UTC — Jun 29)

Identified - Jetstream2 is offline due to a power outage caused by a “severe weather event.” https://jetstream.status.io/pages/incident/61dc808a7e9a82053ce739d2/649de482843954053d13e4e0 (20:07 UTC — Jun 29)

Resolved - Jetstream2 back online after power outage. LoggerNet and station status pods found in error state due to distributed MinIO bug. Patched MinIO to restore service. API and all services are back up. (03:30 UTC — Jun 30)
item.content:
Investigating - System monitoring reported API is offline. (19:59 UTC — Jun 29)

Identified - Jetstream2 is offline due to a power outage caused by a “severe weather event.” https://jetstream.status.io/pages/incident/61dc808a7e9a82053ce739d2/649de482843954053d13e4e0 (20:07 UTC — Jun 29)

Resolved - Jetstream2 back online after power outage. LoggerNet and station status pods found in error state due to distributed MinIO bug. Patched MinIO to restore service. API and all services are back up. (03:30 UTC — Jun 30)
